author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. Every year at this time I want to become a skier. 2. Pistachio blossom cookies?! OMG I need. 3. Speaking of… did you get a jar of my pistachio cookie butter yet?! 4. Other things I want to do: start drinking yerba mate. Tell me more. 5. Two my favorite things ever… but could […]
text: 1. Every year at this time I want to become a skier. 2. Pistachio blossom cookies?! OMG I need. 3. Speaking of… did you get a jar of my pistachio cookie butter yet?! 4. Other things I want to do: start drinking yerba mate. Tell me more. 5. Two my favorite things ever… but could I really eat caesar salad cheesecake. 6. We have coyotes in our woods and they howl in the middle of the night – it sounds maniacal. Nothing like I’d expect! It wakes me up and sounds almost like a video game or something. 7. How to stop comparing your stuff to others. 8. TV things!! I watched White Lotus and how cute was the SNL special?! 9. I love the 15 day rule.
html:
1. Every year at this time I want to become a skier.

2. Pistachio blossom cookies?! OMG I need.

3. Speaking of… did you get a jar of my pistachio cookie butter yet?!

4. Other things I want to do: start drinking yerba mate. Tell me more.

5. Two my favorite things ever… but could I really eat caesar salad cheesecake.

6. We have coyotes in our woods and they howl in the middle of the night – it sounds maniacal. Nothing like I’d expect! It wakes me up and sounds almost like a video game or something.

7. How to stop comparing your stuff to others.

8. TV things!! I watched White Lotus and how cute was the SNL special?!

9. I love the 15 day rule.
